com.xatkit.util

Class XbaseUtils

extends Object
    An utility class providing helpers for Xbase objects.

    • Method Detail

      • isPlatformActionCall

        public static boolean isPlatformActionCall(org.eclipse.xtext.xbase.XMemberFeatureCall featureCall,
                                           RuntimePlatformRegistry registry)
        Returns true if the provided featureCall is a platform's action call, false otherwise.
        Parameters:
        featureCall - the XMemberFeatureCall to check
        registry - the RuntimePlatformRegistry containing the loaded PlatformDefinitions.
        Returns:
        true if the provided featureCall is a platform's action call, false otherwise

      • getPlatformName

        public static String getPlatformName(org.eclipse.xtext.xbase.XMemberFeatureCall actionCall)
        Returns the name of the platform corresponding to the provided actionCall.

        The qualified name of the provided actionCall matches the following pattern: Platform.Action. This method extracts the name of the platform and returns it as a String.

        Parameters:
        actionCall - the XMemberFeatureCall representing the action call to retrieve the platform name from
        Returns:
        the platform name
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if the provided actionCall is null
        IllegalStateException - if the actionCall's qualified name doesn't follow the Platform .Action template

      • getActionName

        public static String getActionName(org.eclipse.xtext.xbase.XMemberFeatureCall actionCall)
        Returns the name of the action corresponding to the provided actionCall.

        The qualified name of the provided actionCall matches the following pattern: Platform.Action. This method extracts the name of the action and returns it as a String.

        Parameters:
        actionCall - the XMemberFeatureCall representing the action call to retrieve the action name from
        Returns:
        the action name
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if the provided actionCall is null
        IllegalStateException - if the actionCall's qualified name doesn't follow the Platform .Action template
